Package com.azure.spring.cloud.core.implementation.factory

Class AbstractAzureServiceClientBuilderFactory<T>

java.lang.Object
com.azure.spring.cloud.core.implementation.factory.AbstractAzureServiceClientBuilderFactory<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of the service client builder
All Implemented Interfaces:
AzureServiceClientBuilderFactory<T>, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractAzureAmqpClientBuilderFactory, AbstractAzureHttpClientBuilderFactory, CosmosClientBuilderFactory
public abstract class AbstractAzureServiceClientBuilderFactory<T> extends Object implements AzureServiceClientBuilderFactory<T>, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
Abstract azure service client builder factory, it's the implementation of AzureServiceClientBuilderFactory to provide the template methods to extend any service on the top of azure core.

    • build

      public T build()
      Build the service client builder. The build consists of following steps:
      1. Create a builder instance.
      2. Configure Azure core level configuration.
      3. Configure service level configuration.
      4. Customize builder.
      Specified by:
      build in interface AzureServiceClientBuilderFactory<T>
      Returns:
      the service client builder.

    • configureCore

      protected void configureCore(T builder)
      Configure Azure core level configurations. The core configuration consists of following steps:
      1. Configure Application Id.
      2. Configure Azure environment.
      3. Configure Configuration.
      4. Configure retry.
      5. Configure proxy.
      6. Configure credential.
      7. Configure connection string.
      8. Configure default credential.
      Parameters:
      builder - The service client builder.

    • configureApplicationId

      protected void configureApplicationId(T builder)
      Configure application id to the builder.The application id provided to sdk should be a concatenation of customer-application-id and azure-spring-identifier.
      Parameters:
      builder - The service client builder.

    • configureConfiguration

      protected void configureConfiguration(T builder)
      Configure Configuration to the builder. The Configuration is a container for predefined Azure sdk environment variables.
      Parameters:
      builder - The service client builder.

    • configureCredential

      protected void configureCredential(T builder)
      Configure credential to the builder. It will try to resolve the credential first. The authentication types a service client supports is defined in getAuthenticationDescriptors(Object). If a credential is resolved successfully, the credentialConfigured flag will be set to true.
      Parameters:
      builder - The service client builder.

    • configureConnectionString

      protected void configureConnectionString(T builder)
      Configure the connection string to the builder if the credential is not yet configured. It will try to resolve a connection string from the AzureProperties, if it is a ConnectionStringProvider instance. If no connection string found from the AzureProperties, it will check if any ServiceConnectionStringProvider is provided and get the connection string from the provider if set. If a connection string is resolved successfully, the credentialConfigured flag will be set to true.
      Parameters:
      builder - The service client builder.

    • configureDefaultCredential

      protected void configureDefaultCredential(T builder)
      Configure the default token credential to the builder. The default credential will be set if and only if the credentialConfigured is false.
      Parameters:
      builder - The service client builder.

    • addBuilderCustomizer

      public void addBuilderCustomizer(AzureServiceClientBuilderCustomizer<T> customizer)
      Add a AzureServiceClientBuilderCustomizer to the factory. The factory provides a template of how to configure the service client builder, but the caller of the factory call customize the configuration by adding one or many AzureServiceClientBuilderCustomizer. The customizers will be called after all default configuration defined by the factory applied to the service client builder.
      Parameters:
      customizer - An implementation of AzureServiceClientBuilderCustomizer.

    • getBuilderCustomizers

      protected List<AzureServiceClientBuilderCustomizer<T>> getBuilderCustomizers()
      Get the list of builder customizers.
      Returns:
      The list of builder customizers.

    • customizeBuilder

      protected void customizeBuilder(T builder)
      Call the list of AzureServiceClientBuilderCustomizer one by one to apply the customization.
      Parameters:
      builder - The service client builder.

    • setSpringIdentifier

      public void setSpringIdentifier(String springIdentifier)
      Set the Spring Cloud Azure library identifier to the factory. The identifier will be set to the application id, and the application id will be sent with requests made by the service client.
      Parameters:
      springIdentifier - The Spring Cloud Azure library identifier.
      See Also:
      • AzureSpringIdentifier

    • setDefaultTokenCredential

      public void setDefaultTokenCredential(com.azure.core.credential.TokenCredential defaultTokenCredential)
      Set the default token credential. A null default token credential will be ignored.
      Parameters:
      defaultTokenCredential - The default token credential.

    • setConnectionStringProvider

      public void setConnectionStringProvider(ServiceConnectionStringProvider<?> connectionStringProvider)
      Set the connection string provider.
      Parameters:
      connectionStringProvider - The connection string provider.

    • setTokenCredentialResolver

      public void setTokenCredentialResolver(AzureCredentialResolver<com.azure.core.credential.TokenCredential> tokenCredentialResolver)
      Set the token credential resolve. A null resolver will be ignored.
      Parameters:
      tokenCredentialResolver - The token credential resolver.
